author: Nihat Pir
title: Farrukh Jumayev: Youth camp in Azerbaijan's Lachin to create basis for new projects | Report.az
text:
Farrukh Jumayev: Youth camp in Azerbaijan's Lachin to create basis for new projects
Cultural policy
- 26 August, 2025
- 12:59
The main goal of the youth camp in Azerbaijan's Lachin is to introduce the participants to the culture and history of the city, as well as to unite young people and creative people, the head of the International Cooperation Department of the Ministry of Culture of Azerbaijan Farrukh Jumayev said, Report informs.
According to him, the camp will include an exchange of views on the achievements of Azerbaijani youth, which will create a basis for future projects and new organizations. Representatives from 21 countries are participating in the event.
"Over the course of several days, participants will be able to get to know Lachin, its culture, and also take part in master classes," Jumayev noted.
He emphasized that Azerbaijan is actively developing the creative industries, and the main theme of the camp is their promotion and the involvement of young people in this process.
